name: Car Stunts Racing
description:
It's time to do car stunts on Mega Ramps Racing with your favorite cars like sport, race, classic, and speed cars with your favorite superhero. A one-touch race, fly, crash game that sends you hurtling through the air in your car before smashing into everything in your path!
How to play?
Choose your favorite car, or superhero and control the speed behind your wheel to dive into the extreme fun of ultimate stunts on impossible mega ramps tracks
Complete the interesting and different challenging missions to hone your skills in car games in 2022
Boost up your powers by completing the stunt challenges on impossible tracks in different environments and win the different titles of mega ramp stunt driving games
Hurry to beat the finish line with dangerous stunts to win the exciting rewards and to qualify for the next challenging missions
Let’s tighten your seat belt and win this new game 2022, which will blow your mind with terrific, stunning, and stirring car games on crazy, insane, and impossible tracks
Game Feature
Open vertical and horizontal ramps
Large environments and multiple mega ramps in this thrilling game
Different car selection options like monster trucks and sport racing cars
Huge collection of multiple cars like formula cars and sport cars
Interesting levels and missions of extreme car stunts
Speed control options and different sign boards to control the acceleration
Winning rewards and much more gifts
Unique HD stunt tracks
Different camera views
Many superheroes characters
What are you waiting for? Play games and enjoy all the exciting moments.
